import React, { Component } from "react"; import MyMemoryShots from "../assets/mymemoryScreenshots.png"; class Projects extends Component { render() { return (

Projects

In addition to the many technologies and projects I have worked on during my time at university, I have also been working on the following projects independently.

MyMemory

MyMemory is an Android app built with React-Native, designed through a user-centred approach with caregivers of people with Dementia. MyMemory is a digital gallery designed for people with Dementia/Alzheimer's by using their personal photos and input to format information for readability to help with reminiscence. The data can be changed and removed, with personal quizzes that use the photos and data added to help users recall information. The input is stored using Firebase real-time database.

); } } export default Projects;
